targets.rawSql:
SELECT
	it.name AS 'name field',
	it.itemid,
	h.name AS hostname,
	i.location AS geohash,
	i.location_lat as latitude,
	i.location_lon as longitude,
	ht.value AS metric
FROM
	hosts h,
	items it,
	host_inventory i,
	history_uint ht
WHERE
	it.hostid = h.hostid
AND it.name LIKE '%ping%'
AND h.hostid = i.hostid
AND ht.itemid = it.itemid
AND ht.value = 1
AND clock BETWEEN UNIX_TIMESTAMP(NOW() - INTERVAL 1 MINUTE) AND UNIX_TIMESTAMP(NOW());

SELECT
	it.name AS 'name field',
	it.itemid,
	h.name AS hostname,
	i.location AS geohash,
	i.location_lat as latitude,
	i.location_lon as longitude,
	ht.value AS metric
FROM
	hosts h,
	items it,
	host_inventory i,
	history_uint ht
WHERE
	it.hostid = h.hostid
AND it.name LIKE '%ping%'
AND h.hostid = i.hostid
AND ht.itemid = it.itemid
AND ht.value = 0
AND clock BETWEEN UNIX_TIMESTAMP(NOW() - INTERVAL 1 MINUTE) AND UNIX_TIMESTAMP(NOW());

functions.text: replaceAlias(/.*Number of bytes received on interface (.*)/, $1:Rx)
replaceAlias(/.*Number of bytes transmitted on interface (.*)/, $1:Tx)
